name: Laura Doman
offering: Business Coaching, Business Consulting, Coach Marketing Training, Communication Training, Content Creation, Content Marketing, Event Hosting, Presentation Skills, Public Speaking, Social Media Marketing, Speaker Training, Video Marketing

jv_history.partner_name: Think Digital Partners  thanks for having me today, such a great panel… | Laura Gregory
jv_history.source_quote: Laura Gregory’s Post ... Think Digital Partners thanks for having me today, such a great panel, and after conversations around how we grow and maintain our Digital and Data Skills in Government. ... K

what_you_do: Laura Doman is an actor, media communications coach, speaker, and author.
social_proof: Laura is a frequent speaker at conferences and business meetings, most often on her signature topic, "On Camera Confidence: Secrets from the Acting World." She also appears regularly on webinars and podcasts and is the co-author of "The Most Amazing Marketing Book Ever" with 35 other marketing specialists worldwide.
business_focus: Laura bridges the worlds of business and entertainment, bringing the best of both to each other through years of experience as a screen and voice actor, improv performer, and former corporate IT sales exec.
